title: Work-Energy Principle
text: Use the work-energy principle and relate the work done to the change in rotational kinetic energy: $$W=KE$$. Thus we have $$\tau \theta=185$$.

title: Solve for Torque
text: The stopping torque $$𝜏=\frac{KE}{\theta}=\frac{185J}{2} rev=$$? (inNm) Remember to first convert $$2$$ rev to radians.

title: Calculate the Required Force
text: The force exerted by the father to create this stopping torque is: $$F=\frac{\tau}{r}$$. Sustitute the values and calculate the F in N.
